subject: Re: for David Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon and his use of Franks Box
author: David Rountree
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0066_01C9436F.ABC31710
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Right now I am running an experiment called the EMF/EVP correlation
experiment. Using a specially designed set up, I am logging evidence that
directly correlates EMF and EVP. If anyone is interested, you can look at
the work on my site at: 
 
http://www.spinvestigations.org/EMF-EVP-CORRELATOR.pdf
 
Additionally, I am running a series of experiments on Cold Plasma detection,
but it isn't related to EVP directly, more on the probable source of
paranormal phenomena.
 
David M. Rountree, AES
Scientific Paranormal Investigative
Research Information and Technology
 
www.spinvestigations.org <http://www.spinvestigations.org/> 
 

------=_NextPart_000_0066_01C9436F.ABC31710
